result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for managing banners, including creating, editing, retrieving, and listing banners based on their status.
result.architecture: The folder follows a service-oriented architecture pattern, encapsulating business logic related to banners within a dedicated service.

internal/services/banners/banner.go.purpose: This file defines a service for managing banners, including creating, editing, retrieving, and listing banners based on their status.
side_effects: Interacts with the banner repository to persist changes to the database.
risks: Potential for UUID collision, though unlikely; error handling may not cover all edge cases.
